storyInfo: Siege, who stayed behind to help the Self-Salvation Corps' retreat, along with Clovisia's forces, are pursued by the Sarkaz Sanguinarch.

attributes.content: Do we... Do we need to keep increasing our reload rate?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Are you seriously trying to eradicate every mobile plate in the city?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Got a problem with the general's orders?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I... I'm just concerned that bombardment on this scale will have an effect on the walls...
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Nothing like this has ever happened before. If Londinium wants to swap out plates inside the city, we'd simultaneously have to shift around the walls...
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Didn't ask.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Are you going to obey, or are you going to die? Those are your only two options.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I think he still has a third option.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You––! Urgh...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Can you still stand, Captain?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I... I'll be alright. Who are you?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: An old battle buddy.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Over here! Someone snuck in!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: This shield? Where the hell did Victorian soldiers come from––
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It feels pretty nice to use a weapon I'm familiar with.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain, can this model of cannon... take out the control system of the city defense artillery?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No... It's not possible...
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: I was expecting as much.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, we've mopped up the Sarkaz outside!
attributes.name: Rescued Soldier

attributes.content: Make sure to thank Mr. Misery again on my behalf.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain, is there any other way to deactivate the artillery?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No need for the long face. You've been praying that we'd come.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: After all, you didn't even cover up your old ID from the city defense forces.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: This is just a blunder. The Sarkaz... won't kill me over something like this yet.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: But if you help us, you'll be put to death?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: And my family too.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: They'll get dragged in. The Sarkaz can kill them off at any time.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Carle, put your sights on this traitor.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Um, Lieutenant... Where am I supposed to aim...?
attributes.name: Rescued Soldier

attributes.content: Here. At my heart.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: If I die... Perhaps only then, the Sarkaz will forget about me, and stop haunting my family.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: If you've made up your mind, we'll work with you.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Alright. Thank you, Lieutenant.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: If you want to turn off the cannons, there are only two ways.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: One, is to have the Sarkaz general stop them himself... The other, is to completely destroy the control room.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: For the first method to work, we'll have to defeat Manfred.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That's right. As for the second option... We don't have enough firepower. And besides... Are you prepared to tear down a cornerstone of Londinium's walls with your own hands?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: I know it's what we should do.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What about you, Captain? Are you prepared?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I've been waiting for this moment... for a long time.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Lieutenant, you missed.
attributes.name: Rescued Soldier

attributes.content: Bloody hell, I suppose my hand slipped.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Help him down the lift. Whether he lives or dies... should be in his own hands.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Too much has happened on these walls today. We don't need to add another traitor.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What about us? Should we head up as well?
attributes.name: Rescued Soldier

attributes.content: Let's go. We're going to pay Manfred another visit.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Woah, this lift is going up way too fast––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: L-Let's not talk right now... or I might vomit all over the Doctor.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: After all, we've been dragged several hundred meters via zipline...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Everyone catch your bearings? Enemies are approaching!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've got more intruders here! Report to the general immediately!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Closure, we need to find some way of shutting down those cannons––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If that means we have to take out Manfred, we'd better make it quick.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The longer we take, the more the remaining Self-Salvation Corps on the ground will be at risk.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...... *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: To think you'd get blasted like this by a boy who's barely seen a fight... What an embarrassment you are.
Even a tiny metal crab, when backed into a corner... will pinch your hand.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You'd better hope Manfred buys your story.
You shouldn't be here. It's too risky.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So you'd rather lean against rubble gasping for breath than let me lend you a hand?
*wheeze*... If you wanted to hold me up... the other side would be better.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Thanks to her, I can't move this arm anymore.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You ran into her. What did you think?
Well, she noticed 'Her Highness.'
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Then, she...
Didn't change at all.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're positive? We all saw what she was like back then.
Even when she was chasing down those assassins, her body riddled with wounds, could she have imagined... that Her Majesty wasn't dead?
She's not the volatile, impulsive mercenary she used to be.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So, she's getting even crazier?
Who can say?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The truth is in front of us. She snuck into Londinium by herself and didn't toss a single bomb for two weeks. Not even Manfred noticed her.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The way she was before, she would've rushed straight into Westhaleg and buried a hundred landmines under Theresis's throne before getting herself killed by Confessarii.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I can reasonably assume she's formed some wiser plans with those folks from Babel... Or rather, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You almost traded your life away just to make sure of that? Aren't you playing it a bit too fast-and-loose?
Manfred's underlings always have eyes on me. This was the only safe way we could meet.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Too bad for Schwab...
He made his peace the moment he sided with W.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Or should I say... We've all made our peace.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I sure hope so.
Who's there?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I smell... Confessarius!
I told Manfred you can't be trusted.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Hoederer, did you really think you could hide your clever little gestures from our eyes?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: This is all a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Oh? Unfortunately for you, you won't have another chance to twist words around in front of the leader and the Regent.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: You don't need to pretend to bow your head anymore. Pick up your sword and revel in your last battle, mercenary.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: If that... is an order, then...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You are powerless.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: You can't hope to protect your companions.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Not a single shadow here... can escape my eyes.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Hoederer...
Run!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No, you're not giving the orders here. It cost us a lot to come this far––
Even more reason why we can't both die here!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Worry not. I'll execute both of you here, together.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: You may take a moment to decide who goes first––
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Nngh?!
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: He went down... without a struggle?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You... It's you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: He got too cocky.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: No one can claim to master all shadows. Infinite possibilities lie where the eyes cannot perceive.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hurry, get out of here. If you want to live, return to the sunlight.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I still have other things to do.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'll have you know... Confessarii underlings aren't the only ones here.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander, the metal structure behind us just fell––
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: That's not all...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: He's here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You feel it too?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Vina, I didn't hear anything except the sound of shelling.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The sound of his heartbeat disappeared.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Run!!!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We've lost contact with the 12th––
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: They've all been sacrificed.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Their voices completely vanished.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: These... pitch-black pipes should amplify any and all sounds.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Breathing or footsteps, the clacking of a metal crab crawling through the pipe, or the rumble of machinery––
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: These pipes will record the vibrations of any signs of life.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And in an instant... all of those voices were devoured.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You mean to say, this darkness behind us––
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Is all the life it has devoured.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Just like what happened at that banquet three months ago.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Engineering team, close the first safety lock!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes, Commander!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Miss Siege, you've... got sharp senses.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Are you familiar with Londinium's underground structure?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I remember Feist saying... you're from around these parts?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I've... only been here once.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But I've heard a lot of stories about these pipes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: A hundred years ago, a terrible fire ripped through the heart of Londinium. Only the royal family and a few nobles managed to escape the flames.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: After that, a legend began to circulate that a magic circle was hidden beneath the palace that could allow the royal family to escape any disaster.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: When I first heard that story, I couldn't help but wonder... would our royal family also use these very same pipes for their escape?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Hmm... The story I heard was very similar to your version.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The workers who built Londinium, the posh aristocrats and nobles, and the royal family itself–– are all forced to take the same route during times of crises.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: That already is a story that writes itself.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander, the safety lock is starting to give!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: This door cannot hold him back.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Are you serious? This door's thickness can withstand seven or eight salvos from an armored vehicle!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Retreat! Fall back!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: With a sharp, earsplitting noise, a fissure appears in the middle of the metal door.

Under the tearing and folding of the tremendous force behind the door, the thick metal sheet seems thinner than paper. The fissure continues to grow, the dark void behind it like a monstrous, abyssal maw.
Close the second safety lock!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Understoo–– Arrrgh!!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: The door slams shut with a heavy thud, but the person sealing the door suddenly slips. Before he has a chance to scream, something invisible drags him into the shadows behind the door.
A smudge of blood seeps through the door's crack.
But not even the pool of blood is allowed to escape. In an instant, the shadows lurch through the door and instantly devour half the passageway.
Another massive roar rings out, though it is unclear whether it came from overhead or behind.
The pipe shudders, and the shadow's edge blurs like a predator's mouthparts, extending to latch onto its prey's ankle.
I... I've also heard of another story.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: During a battle two hundred years ago, the Victorian Army joined forces with two other nations to lay siege to a city called Kazdel.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: One night, an entire army of heavily-armed troops disappeared in the valley where they were stationed.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The count who had dispatched the army sent men to investigate their whereabouts, but only saw the crimson of the setting sun reflected against the mountain walls.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And as everyone remembered, that day... the sun had not come out at all.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The third safety lock––
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Is this... the last one?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Clovisia doesn't answer her.
Just like her answer... Devoured by the monster flooding through the pipes.
